section.name: Introduction
section.p: The ant task is used to generate the MetaClass descriptors from annotated Java source files. The following table lists the attributes for ant task

tr.td: The destination directory where descriptors are generated.
A flag indicating whether attributes without any namespace (ie are not of form X.Y) should be added to descriptors. Valid values include true and false.
A flag indicating whether method descriptors for methods with no attributes are kept.

section.p: The task also accepts child elements;

ul.li: FileSet: Defines the files processed by task.
Interceptor: Defines interceptors applied to generation.
Filter: Defines filter applied to generation.

section.p: The Interceptor and Filter elements both accept a name parameter that defines the name of the class. The also contain a "classpath" element which is a path-like structure that defines the classpath used to load either the filter or interceptor.
